name: Beanus Breaks Back
description:
Please enjoy my Fan Game of everyone's favourite Digitiser Character, Beanus!

Collect beans! Avoid Peas!

Controls:

Jump with "Space"

Move with "A" and "D"

Mute Music with "M"

Mute SFX with "N"

Feel free to donate if you like what I'm doing! :)

Ko-fi.com/balmut

Watch Digitiser here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdMWnD7qCz4Y7FbbbfyDq5g

Read Digitiser here:

https://www.digitiser2000.com/
